Oups. Right comment at the wrong torrent. I meant to post this here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6783651/Pink_Floyd_-_Box_Set_Discovery_(EMI_Records_Remastered_2011)

^^^^ Let's not confuse quality with quantity.  At nearly 2TB of music I don't need to save anything I don't use.  These files are bit perfect to the original and do include high quality artwork.  I'll never upload .CUE because I don't use them and my CD burning software doesn't need them.  More importantly to me, streaming these files to my HIFI doesn't require them either.  My apologies again to those that would like them but I'm sure once someone opens this torrent and sees they aren't there will simply move on to another version.... no time wasted at all.

Enjoy the music people!
the dogs bollocks :) thank's for this
THANKS so FLACking much rjordan21!!! One of the best torrents of all time :)  Good speed too!! This one I will seed back to at least 10.1 ratio.

...................and I agree .cue sucks. There is no need for it anymore and it can sometimes be a real bitch!! Besides these files are ready to burn to disc with NO need to bother with .cues. The artwork in this is a real plus :)  I +1 this torrent and can't believe 6 stupid dicks have -1 rated it so far. If you love real FLAC then this IS the torrent you want!! THANKS again rjordan21!!

The quality is superb, one of the best torrents ever uploaded.
